rules_text:
[i]Feh The Owl[/i] – At the beginning of your upkeep, if you attacking during your last turn, create a Treasure token.
[i]More Than You Bargained For[/i] – Whenever you cast a spell with mana from a Treasure, discover X, where X is the amount of mana from Treasures to cast that spell. [i](To discover X, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card with mana value X or less. Cast it without paying its mana cost or put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom in a random order.)[/i]
